prompt_full:
You are extending Athena Web with two new features. The app is a Node.js Express server with hash-based frontend routing.

## 1. Artifact Viewer
A new page at #/artifacts that renders markdown files from the server beautifully.

Backend:
- GET /api/artifacts — list available artifacts from these directories:
  - ~/.openclaw/workspace/docs/research/ (research papers)
  - ~/.openclaw/workspace/state/results/ (review reports, analysis)  
  - ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/ (daily journals, read-only)
  - Any .md file matching PRD_*.md in ~/.openclaw/workspace/
- GET /api/artifacts/:path — return raw markdown content for a specific file

Frontend:
- List view showing all artifacts grouped by category
- Click to open — render markdown to HTML (use a lightweight md parser, marked or similar)
- Clean reading experience with the existing Greek aesthetic
- Back button to return to list

## 2. File Upload / Text Input
A new page at #/inbox for sending files and text to Athena.

Backend:
- POST /api/inbox/text — accept text/code snippets, save to ~/.openclaw/workspace/inbox/ with timestamp filename
- POST /api/inbox/upload — accept file uploads (multipart), save to ~/.openclaw/workspace/inbox/
- GET /api/inbox — list inbox contents
- Create ~/.openclaw/workspace/inbox/ if it doesn't exist

Frontend:
- Text area for pasting long text, code, or notes
- File upload button with drag-and-drop
- Show recent inbox items
- Match existing app styling

## 3. Navigation
Add Artifacts and Inbox to the existing nav bar alongside Oracle, Beads, Agents, Scrolls, Chronicle.

Install any needed npm packages (marked for markdown, multer for uploads).
Run npm test after changes to check nothing is broken.
